des:
Daily Log: Email-Organized Voice Logging

Effortlessly track your daily activities with Daily Log, an innovative Alexa skill that organizes your voice-logged entries directly in your email. Unlike skills that require voice retrieval, Daily Log uniquely sends your logs to your inbox for easy access and review.

Key Features:
• Voice-activated logging for hands-free convenience
• Automatic email organization of your logs
• Daily email summaries of your logged activities
• Suitable for tracking medications, skincare routines, household chores, and more
• Simple and intuitive interface

Getting Started:
1. Say "Alexa, open Daily Log" to begin.
2. Enable email summaries by saying: "Alexa, ask Daily Log to send daily log reports to my email" or "Alexa, ask Daily Log to enable sending logs to my email."
3. Grant email permissions through the Alexa app when prompted.
4. To disable email reports at any time, say: "Alexa, ask Daily Log to disable sending daily reports email."

Once set up, simply log events as they happen. For example:
• "Add that I just took my medications"
• "Please log that I watered the plants"
• "Note that I called my doctor's office"
• "Record that I finished my workout"
• "Enter into the log that I completed my skincare routine"

Email summaries are sent daily, usually in the early morning hours, summarizing yesterday's logs for you. 

Requirements:
• An Amazon account linked to a valid email address
• Any Alexa-enabled device
• Internet connection

Supported Devices:
Daily Log works with all Alexa-enabled devices, including Echo speakers, smartphones with the Alexa app, and Alexa-compatible smart home devices.

Privacy Notice:
Daily Log temporarily stores your logged entries to facilitate email delivery. We do not retain or use your data for any other purpose. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.

Disclaimers:
• Daily Log is designed as a personal tracking tool and is not intended as a replacement for professional medical tracking systems. Always consult healthcare professionals for managing medical conditions or treatments.
• If the skill's content includes food-safety information: Consult a healthcare professional or government guidelines should you have additional concerns about allergies, dietary restrictions or food safety and handling.

Daily Log is not affiliated with or endorsed by Amazon. It is an independent skill developed to enhance your Alexa experience.

We value your feedback! If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, please contact us by submitting an issue using this form:

https://bit.ly/dailylogissue

Give Daily Log a try today and experience the convenience of email-organized voice logging!
